rag.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a small piece of old cloth, for example one used for cleaning things
rag.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: He wiped his boots dry with an old rag.
rag.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a newspaper, especially one that you think is not particularly important or of good quality
rag.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: He writes for the local rag.
rag.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: an event organized by students every year in order to make money for people who are poor, sick etc
rag.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to laugh at someone or play tricks on them
